about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Gretex Corporate Services Ltd is a financial and consultancy service provider in India. It is a SEBI registered merchant banker that key business activities include fund raising management activities, investment advisory, underwriting of issues, corporate advisory services, and more.

Initially, the company has started its business as a project finance service provider through banks and financial institutions but over the period, it has expanded its product portfolio and presently, offers services in different areas i.e. capital markets, corporate finance, debt syndication, corporate restructuring, and compliance advisory.

Product and Services

  • Capital Markets: IPO, De-listing, right issue, open offer, exit offer.
  • Corporate Finance: Private equity, valuation, venture capital, debt securities issue, and bank finance.
  • Corporate Restructuring: Takeover, merger & acquisitions, demergers.
  • Compliance advisory: Statutory compliance and secretarial support services.

Competitive strengths

  • Diversified range of financial and consultancy service offerings.
  • Rich managerial experience.
  • Standard quality of services and long-term relationship with customers.

faqs.question: What is the Gretex Corporate Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Gretex Corporate Services IPO is a SME IPO of 301600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.13 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹170 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on July 27, 2021, and closes on July 30, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Gretex Corporate Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Gretex Corporate Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Gretex Corporate Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Gretex Corporate Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Gretex Corporate Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Gretex Corporate Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Gretex Corporate Services IPO opens on July 27, 2021 and closes on July 30, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Gretex Corporate Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Gretex Corporate Services IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,36,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Gretex Corporate Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Gretex Corporate Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Gretex Corporate Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Gretex Corporate Services IPO will be done on Wednesday, August 4, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, August 6, 2021. Check the Gretex Corporate Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Gretex Corporate Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Gretex Corporate Services IPO listing date is on Monday, August 9, 2021.
